english.segment1: I can't complain I got the best things money can buy. But I'm feeling hollow driing solo in the ride of my life. I wana know, I wanna see what's missing in me.
english.segment2: Tell me the truth, I'm looking for. What's missing in me?
english.segment3: I'm living a dream got a big screen in my limousine. I'm on top of the world. I found the perfect girl. I'm a sight that you can se, but I ain't happy. There's got to e some more to this dream.
english.segment4: Oh! Can it be true You died on a tree for people like me?. I've been ore than a fool., how much more could you do?. I've been lost without you!. I've been more than a fool. So tell me what can I do?.
